name: live-polling-system
description: Resilient Live Polling System - Teacher and Student Poll Management

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build: npm run build-backend && npm run build-frontend
scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
